content:
a few days later, the girls found their way to the Industrious planet of Bastion, the temporary capital of the Empire, as the old capital of Coruscant is still under the control of the New Republic. Lizzie and Alyssa took a shuttle down to the planet, and went to the Imperial Capital building. Lizzie, as the current ruler of the empire, had business to take care of, and Alyssa was following alongside her, and Mila standing intimidatingly with them both, clad in her combat gear, and armed to the tits.

(PROMPT: have Lizzie, Alyssa, and Mila enter the conference room, where they meet up with the council of Moffs, have Lizzie bring up Zsinj, a former warlord for the empire, who broke away and formed his own warlord kingdom, as many others did, and was attempting to rebuild the empire his own way. Zsinj has the old Sith Worlds at the core of his empire, and they are in no way a recent aquisition, as zsinj had it almost since the start of his splinter empire, which is headed on the non-sith planet of Serenno. Lizzie wants the sith worlds. with Zsinj causing issues for both the Empire and the Republic, so Lizzie believes the two sides might be able to temporarily cease hostilities, in order to partition Zsinj's empire. remember, to start the prompt with lizzie entering, and show her presenting and explaining the plan.)
